name: Save the Titanic
description:
Our all new "TOURNAMENT MODE" allows you to play for fun or for REAL CASH PRIZES! [requires iOS 7.0]

You know you're the best at saving the Titanic, right? Well, here's your chance to prove it! Enter tournaments against other players and you can win real money! Or just play for fun and climb your way to the top of the leaderboard.

Or practice your skills in the “Endurance” mode:
How long can you survive an unlimited stream of icebergs? This challenge will test your reflexes as you dodge and tap icebergs as well as collect power ups to help you reach for a new distance record.

Or you can always play the "Classic" mode:
If you could go back in time to that fateful night and change history, would you? Well, here's your chance to "Save the Titanic!" Take command and rewrite history. Climb aboard! Step onto the bridge and take destiny by the... wheel. This is your moment to become the hero that saves them all. Or maybe you just feel like aiming for that overgrown ice cube. Go ahead!
